# Microsoft Teams (Complete)

# Teams Core

# Microsoft 365 Identity
DOMAIN-SUFFIX,login.microsoftonline.com

DOMAIN-SUFFIX,msauthimages.net

# Microsoft API / Front Door
DOMAIN-SUFFIX,api.microsoft.com

# CDN / Static

# Telemetry / Events
DOMAIN,teams.events.data.microsoft.com
